# NSSpellChecker.CorrectionIndicatorType.guesses

**Case**

Shows multiple alternatives from which the user may choose the appropriate spelling.

## Declaration

```swift
case guesses
```

## Constants

- **NSSpellChecker.CorrectionIndicatorType.default**: The default indicator that shows a proposed correction.
- **NSSpellChecker.CorrectionIndicatorType.reversion**: Provides the option to revert to the original form after a correction has been made.
